backend/main.mo: Motoko canister providing user profile storage and queries with access control and a public sitemap URL.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a homepage About section requirement to HomePage.tsx and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing summarized descriptions of multiple frontend components and assets.
frontend/.ic-assets.json: Asset configuration defining caching, headers, and content types for deployed frontend files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Detailed deployment checklist for verifying builds, asset output, redirects, and production readiness.
frontend/DOMAIN_SETUP.md: Guide explaining DNS, redirect, and SSL setup for using a custom domain with the deployment.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and theme settings.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with SEO metadata, structured data, and script mounting the React app.
frontend/public/_headers: Headers config specifying content types for sitemap, robots, icons, and zip asset.
frontend/public/_redirects: Redirect rules ensuring proper SPA routing and direct access to specific static files.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page that redirects non-static unknown routes to the root.
frontend/public/google53082ab74af04c28.h: Google Search Console verification file containing the required verification string.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots file allowing all crawlers and referencing the sitemap URL.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing homepage and about page with metadata for crawlers.
frontend/src/admin/AdminShell.tsx: Empty placeholder file for admin shell component.
frontend/src/admin/components/AdminAuthP: Empty placeholder for admin authentication panel component.
Empty placeholder for admin access control wrapper component.
frontend/src/admin/components/AdminToast: Empty placeholder for admin toast notifications.
frontend/src/admin/components/ConfirmDel: Empty placeholder for a delete confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/admin/components/ProfileSet: Empty placeholder for an admin profile setup modal.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AboutEditorPage: Empty placeholder for an admin editor page for About content.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminHome.tsx: Empty placeholder for the admin home page.
Empty placeholder for admin user management page.
frontend/src/admin/pages/ContactEditorPa: Empty placeholder for admin contact section editor page.
frontend/src/admin/pages/CoursesManagerP: Empty placeholder for admin course management page.
frontend/src/admin/pages/FacultyManagerP: Empty placeholder for admin faculty management page.
frontend/src/admin/pages/LayoutSectionsP: Empty placeholder for admin layout sections management page.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling diagnostics, SEO guards, and simple pathname routing between Home and About pages.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: Renders the About section using marketingSiteContent, showing SEO text, Hindi paragraphs, and a feature card.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: Implements a React error boundary that logs errors and displays a fallback component on failure.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Displays contact info with phone, WhatsApp, email actions, and styled cards using marketingSiteContent.
frontend/src/components/Courses.tsx: Shows a grid of courses with features and an extra info section populated from marketingSiteContent.
frontend/src/components/DomainSetupDialo: Empty or placeholder component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/DownloadWebsiteC: Provides a button that triggers download of a pre-generated ZIP file via a simulated link click.
frontend/src/components/Faculty.tsx: Renders faculty cards with photos, subjects, experience, and bios from marketingSiteContent.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Builds the site footer with branding, quick links, contact details, and social icons.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Implements a responsive header with logo, navigation, scroll-based styling, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section component showing background, headings, CTAs, and stats with smooth scrolling behavior.
frontend/src/components/RuntimeErrorFall: Error fallback UI with message and buttons to refresh or return home.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppButton.t: Floating WhatsApp contact button that opens a chat using the site's phone number.
frontend/src/content/marketingSiteConten: Centralized marketing content including hero text, about info, site metadata, and stats.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActorSafe.t: Safe backend actor hook that conditionally initializes admin access and logs nonâ€‘fatal failures.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Full Internet Identity provider and hook managing login, identity loading, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Hooks for fetching and saving the caller's user profile using the safe backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining color tokens, typography, animations, and custom scrollbar styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point wiring QueryClientProvider, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with SEO metadata updates and displays English and Hindi content plus a feature card.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Composes the home page layout by assembling header, main sections, footer, and WhatsApp button.
frontend/src/static-export/renderStaticS: Generates static HTML for the marketing site using content data and includes header, nav, hero, and other sections.
frontend/src/static-export/staticExportA: Defines the list of image assets to include and their destination paths for static export.
frontend/src/static-export/zipWriter.ts: Provides a simple in-memory ZIP builder for tracking files during static export.
Empty placeholder for future content serialization utilities.
frontend/src/utils/runtimeDiagnostics.ts: Implements optional runtime diagnostics including error logging and render tracing.
frontend/src/utils/seoGuards.ts: Applies SEO rules to enforce canonical URLs and noindex behavior on non-canonical domains.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and managing URL parameters with session persistence and hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, containers, animations, and plugins.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config defining a static export plugin that generates HTML, CSS, JS, copies assets, zips the output, and performs post-build verification.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing project state, including a fix request to restore the homepage About section exactly as before.
